author: dkhaywood
msg: pom.xml: added in dependencies for junit4 4.4 /hamcrest 1.1 / jmock 2.4.  Also specified the version of the Maven Surefire plugin (2.4.2) that will run the junit4 tests.

author: dkhaywood
msg: @Mask: added test (based on junit4/hamcrest), removed System.out.println

author: dkhaywood
msg: @Mask: added test (based on junit4/hamcrest), removed System.out.println

author: dkhaywood
msg: Moved the TypicalLengthFacetDerivedFromType into its own facet factory.

author: dkhaywood
msg: FallbackFacetFactory no longer installs no-op facets for immutable, property defaults, property validates; in addition it no longer installs TypicalLengthZero facet for properties or parameters.  Instead the TypicalLengthAnnotationFacetFactory will derive lengths from the underlying types as required.
